subject: Hockey, Field
lead_paragraph: The United States moved to the top of its women’s pool at the field hockey World Cup in The Hague, beating China, 5-0, behind a hat trick by Katie O’Donnell.
snippet: The United States moved to the top of its women’s pool at the field hockey World Cup in The Hague, beating China, 5-0, behind a hat trick by Katie O’Donnell.
